com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.test.conformance

Class ConformanceTestSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.test.conformance.ConformanceTestSet

  • public class ConformanceTestSet
extends java.lang.Object
    ConformanceTestSet represents a collection of ConformanceTests ordered by the test name. It has methods for scanning a directory to generate an ordered set.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    car
